description.ko: 자체적인 내부 빛으로 밝혀진 심해의 투명한 생명체들을 평온하게 바라본 모습입니다.
description.en: A serene look at the transparent life forms of the deep sea, illuminated by their own internal light.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic shot of the AQUA-5 environment, featuring translucent jellyfish forms with #40E0D0 turquoise bioluminescent pulses. The creatures drift through a dark #000080 midnight zone, trailing #48D1CC cyan fluid dynamics. Tiny bubbles and 'marine snow' particles reflect the #006994 deep sea glow. The composition focuses on the peaceful, weightless dance of transparent life in a high-pressure abyss. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 render, ethereal underwater atmosphere.
